# **Introduction to Python for Data Science**

## Background

In this section, we delve into the basics of Python for Data Science. Python is a simple yet powerful programming language that has utility in web development, scientific computing, data science and machine learning. Our interest in this section is the use of Python for data analysis.

The [site](https://www.python.org/downloads/) <https://www.python.org/downloads/> contains the Python executables for each operating system.
